channel.title: MoparScape Minecraft Map Petition
channel.description:
I am making a petition to bring back the original minecraft map. The map has been changed so many times it's unbelievable, and I and many others would agree that bringing back the original map back would be a great choice. The original map was starting to gain a currency of wood, as many forest fires purged most of the wood and so therefore wood was very scarce. Players would venture out far just to find a tiny bit of wood, etc. No more spawn towns, I miss mitbs mountain hideout and toms and mine little cave house.
Anyone agree? Vote in the poll.

item.title: MoparScape Minecraft Map Petition
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=484383.msg3549471#msg3549471 date=1301419812]
We aren’t taking another vote, so don’t bother posting whether you want a complete/march 1st/no reset. I’m still seeing if I can restore a recent one.
[/quote]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=479610.msg3552470#msg3552470 date=1301625630]
IF we do a reset, I’ll find some way to host the old map so people can at least download it if they did a lot of work, like we all did.
[/quote][/quote]

didnt see that, tom lock this thread plozs

Read full topic
